page.title: 15ADLINGTON STATION MASTER
page.content: The station master at Adlington is Mr.Tweedie.He is the only employee at the station.He starts work at 7.00 and finishes at 15.00.He lives in Stockport and travels to work each day on the train.He sells the tickets, tidies the station and checks that the doors on the train are locked.He has worked at Adlington for 5 years and enjoys his job. He wears a navy blue uniform with red trimming. He would not like to see the station changed but feels that in the future Adlington may be an unmanned station. Mr.Tweedie is a leading railman.He gets 4 weeks holiday each year and should retire at 65. He keeps the station so neat that it has won 6 certificates,2 first prizes,3 second prizes,and 1 third prize.
